calculateFee(uint256).details: Calculate the fee for a given amount.

params.amount: The amount to calculate the fee for.

claim(bytes,address).details: Allows a user to claim deposits.

params.token: The address of the token contract, or zero-address for Ether.

constructor.details: Constructor initializes the contract with a verifier and imageId.

params.initVerifier: The address of the initial verifier contract.

deposit(bytes,address,uint256,uint256).details: Allows a user to deposit tokens or Ether.

params.salt: A unique value to avoid deposit id collisions.
params.token: The address of the token contract, or zero-address for Ether.
The address of the token for the claim.

params.salt: The salt used when the deposit was made.
params.token: The address of the token for the deposit.

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

paused().details: Returns true if the contract is paused, and false otherwise.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby disabling any functionality that is only available to the owner.

params.newVerifier: The address of the new verifier contract.

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

params.token: The address of the token to withdraw, or zero-address for Ether.

withdrawDeposit(bytes,address,uint256).details: Allows a user to clawback deposits.

params.salt: The salt used when the deposit was made.
params.token: The address of the token contract, or zero-address for Ether.
